S.FORM: ci Huang Pens Le aw (kamu nu Hulam: , Juan Ponce de León) i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1513) a mihcaan nu aydaay a Florida (Fou luo li ta cuo ) makatukuh, cacay a milbut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan siwa (1539) a mihcaan, ci Henadu.sutuo ( , Hernando de Soto) sayaway makatukuh i Florida (Fuo luo li ta ), micumud aca tayda i Misisi pi a sauwac mitahaw, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan (1540) a mihcaan, ci Falansise.Keluonatu ( Francisco Vázquezde Coronado) namaka cacay a malebtu lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaa mahiya madebung nu Si pan ya ku Mexico (Muo si ke ) pasaydan i amis muculil. mangalay mikilim tu nakamuwan nu babalaki a Sipuo laci tukay ( (Seven Cities of Cibola), amica kunikacaay ka tepa', naculilan mamin ku Yalisan na a cascasan ( Grand Canyon) atu "Tay pinyun a enal" ( , Great Plains). malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan https: en.wikisource.org wiki Appletons 27 Cyclop C3 A6dia of American Biography Ponce de Leon, Juan https: en.wikipedia.org wiki Juan Ponce de Le C3 B3n
